This game is absolute trash for both survivors and killers. Don't let anyone tell you otherwise, it takes around 600 hours to unlock all of the current perks as of writing this which would be fine if the game was fun to grind over and over and over again, but it isn't.

UPDATE: Currently sitting around 600 hours with a total of 5 new characters (Nemesis, Jane, Leon, Hellraiser. Mikaela) released since my original review. I currently have every character unlocked with only ~25$ spent on DLC. When Nemesis was released it was a shit show with the map being disabled and the killer's perks bordering between "bad" and "not recommended" (other than Lethal Pursuer which felt more situational) 
That being said, the killer himself was incredibly fun to play and didn't feel like a broken mess. 
This was followed by the Hellraiser paragraph and a lot of bug fixes which made the game feel pretty good to play on PC. (The people on console dealt with dead hard being a luck of the draw type perk) 
After this was yet again more bug fixes making the game feel a ton better on my PC with the Witch Hour Paragraph release. This came out with arguably some of the strongest survivor perks but overall nothing genuinely insane.

TLDR: Game is receiving some of the best updates to date, it's in the best shape I've seen it in.

Dead by daylight jest to gra, w której biegasz ocalałym i naprawiasz generatory, aby uciec z terenu zabójcy lub sam się wcielasz w zabójcę i ścigasz czworo ocalałych, a gdy już jakiegoś dopadniesz, musisz go podnieść a potem zanieść do najbliższego haka aby go na nim powiesić, potem musisz uważać żeby żaden inny ocalały go nie zdjął z haka bo inaczej ocalały z haka ucieknie. (to jest mój opis rozgrywki, sprawdź jeszcze inne recenzje przed zakupem gry)

Plusy:
duże i fajne mapy 
ciekawa i rozbudowana rozgrywka 
dużo ocalałych postaci
ładna grafika (8/10 jak dla mnie)
dużo postaci zabójców
umiejętności dla ocalałych lub zabójców
dużo skinów

Minusy:
Za drogie dlc
parę błędów 
ekipa która nie umie grać
I to tyle chyba w mojej recenzji...

Played a long time on console, got the PC version, made it to high ranks on both platforms. This game is fun about 2/10 games. the other 8 are frustrating, because this game is nothing but cheese and exploits. There's little to no balancing at all, because the community is a bunch of people who play killer and scream nerf survivors all day. At high ranks, Killers win every match. Survivors have nothing to protect themselves with anymore, most killers' default power goes through or over pallets, windows and "loops." Then killers have little attachments they can put on their power to make it stupid. Example: Judith's Tombstone on Michael Myers, grab and kill any survivor immediately after reaching power lvl 3. To reach lvl 3 you just gotta hold RMB for 30 seconds. Not hard at all. Playing as a killer is so easy and highly rewarding, while survivor play is difficult and can be cut short by simple things like camping or "tunneling." On top of that, every game is ranked. There's no separation of ranked or casual, making it ideal for people who just exploit broken killer features to feel like they are good because they can stand still after holding RMB and win. Survivors only escape 1 in 12 matches at high rank, and these are the people saying survivors are OP, because "looping" is frustrating. Looping is just running around an obstacle in a circle, forever. If you can't counter that when every killer has a unique power that debilitates survivors (some of which don't even require any skill to utilize) then you are just bad, period. That red number means nothing. Then the game gives you perks. Survivor perks are useful and balanced, while killer perks are like 70% "reveal the survivor." There's no hiding, because anytime you do anything as a survivor, the killer sees you, and that's it. And killer's complain about survivors having perks, when survivor perks are like "heal yourself at half the normal speed" or "escape the killer's grasp by succeeding a difficult skill check, but only for 30 seconds after you've been hooked." The community is a bunch of man-babies, who put little to no effort in playing and want victory handed to them on a silver platter.
好玩，快乐。

This game has moments where it is really fun; As the killer, you get the right map with players that kinda know what their doing and there is a challenge; As the survivor, the killer is equally competent and chases you down like a horror movie monster.
There are also not fun moments; As the killer, the players you're put up against have coordination and start up 2-3 generators before you even see them. As the survivor, you're just constantly holding the mouse buttons or spacebar only to be interrupted by a killer, possibly even one you don't know because it's behind a paywall to play as it.

This game should be free based on the monetization of the in game shop + steam DLC alone; do not spend more than $10 on the base game.

No começo dá um certo "medo" para aqueles que não são fãs de terror. 
Vale a pena jogar com os amigos se você estiver de sobrevivente, mas não te impede de jogar sozinho (você também pode optar por jogar de killer sozinho).
O jogo no começo é difícil e a pessoa tem que entender é que o jogo coloca todas as vantagens pro killer (desde habilidades op até mais velocidade). Depois que você vai pegando o jeito, se torna mais fácil e os sustos vão diminuindo!

Eu indico comprar o jogo em promoção ou quando estiver gratuito para testar!
大爱！

This game is fun from time to time.  Over all though, really buggy!! Especially with Pyramid head. Play mostly as a killer and Survivors are OP. Looping had become so annoying, They often just loop the Generators making the game boring. I only takes 28-80 seconds to repair a Generator so if there is any other survivor anywhere else on the map, chances are they're going to knock it out. & if you leave the survivor looping a geni, they'll get it before you can come back.  Yes there are methods and "tricks" to get around this but the meta has made the game boring. 
It's basically as bad as camping a hooked survivor ... Also makes the game boring... I did my best to play with sportsmanship & make it fun but most games are lame
One of the best multiplayer horror games in the market.

I used to recommend this game. This game used to be my favourite indie game of all time, but the developers are consistently doing things to ruin this game despite huge backlash from players. This new update makes the game borderline unplayable, and a vast majority of feedback has been negative. However, they still decided to publish it.

It's a shame that this game is dying, but I completely understand why. The devs don't listen to their player base, and they obviously don't care what we think.

UPDATE! THEY ARE NOW BANNING PEOPLE ON THE STEAM FORUM FOR COMPLAINING ABOUT THE UPDATE AND DELETING THE HUNDREDS OF THREADS THAT ARE AGAINST THE UPDATE.

Update 9/30/21: They implemented a new MMR system that rewards killers for camping and tunneling. Go look at VHS and get it when it comes out instead of this game. The developers of VHS actually care about their player base and the players' opinions, and the devs at Behaviour certainly do not.

As much as I HATE HATE HATE this game sometimes, I love it. DBD's production team is amazing and I love the game when it plays right. Why is DBD on the PS5 so buttery smooth?? My PC is stronger than that thing. We've been asking for optimization for years.. bring it to us BHVR. I also appreciate you guys for recently adding another black survivor. This game greatly represents every look so anyone can play comfortably and grow a connection to their main. If you're reading this, don't get upset if you die every game or you're facing some tryhard killer... just try to get a 360 on the tryhards and it doesn't matter if you die after that because you spun them lol... but seriously, play to enjoy, don't play to win... it's only 5000 more points. Also run Spine Chill (best perk in the game for newer players).
